name: Sigbot
description:
In this game you control a robot that happens to have no signal.

Controls

The controls are very easy. The only thing you have to now is that you control the robot with w, a, s and d or with the joystick. You can only move the robot, when the screen is dark.

Game Jam

This game was made in 72 hours for the Game Jam "Mini Jam 125: Signal".

But now have a good time with this game.
